physicalExpression.expressionTemplate: CASE  WHEN  NOT %1 IS NULL  THEN  CASE  WHEN %2 = 'Y' THEN 'ORA_PIPELINE' WHEN %2 = 'N' OR %2 IS NULL  THEN 'ORA_STANDARD' ELSE %2 END  ELSE  NULL  END
CASE  WHEN  NOT %1 IS NULL  THEN  CASE  WHEN %2 = 'Y' THEN 'ORA_PIPELINE' WHEN %2 = 'N' OR %2 IS NULL  THEN 'ORA_STANDARD' ELSE %2 END  ELSE  NULL  END

LOOKUP( SPARSE %1,  CASE  WHEN  NOT %2 IS NULL  THEN  CASE  WHEN %3 = 'Y' THEN 'ORA_PIPELINE' WHEN %3 = 'N' OR %3 IS NULL  THEN 'ORA_STANDARD' ELSE %3 END  ELSE  NULL  END ,  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%4),  CASE  WHEN  NOT %2 IS NULL  THEN  CASE  WHEN %3 = 'Y' THEN 'ORA_PIPELINE' WHEN %3 = 'N' OR %3 IS NULL  THEN 'ORA_STANDARD' ELSE %3 END  ELSE  NULL  END )

LOOKUP( SPARSE %1,  CASE  WHEN  NOT %2 IS NULL  THEN  CASE  WHEN %3 = 'Y' THEN 'ORA_PIPELINE' WHEN %3 = 'N' OR %3 IS NULL  THEN 'ORA_STANDARD' ELSE %3 END  ELSE  NULL  END ,  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%4),  CASE  WHEN  NOT %2 IS NULL  THEN  CASE  WHEN %3 = 'Y' THEN 'ORA_PIPELINE' WHEN %3 = 'N' OR %3 IS NULL  THEN 'ORA_STANDARD' ELSE %3 END  ELSE  NULL  END )
LOOKUP( SPARSE %1,  CAST (%2 AS VARCHAR ( 80 )),  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3), %2)
LOOKUP( SPARSE %1,  CAST (%2 AS VARCHAR ( 80 )),  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3), %2)
LOOKUP( SPARSE %1,  CAST (%2 AS VARCHAR ( 80 )),  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3), %2)
LOOKUP( SPARSE %1,  CAST (%2 AS VARCHAR ( 80 )),  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3), %2)

dataFilter.expressionTemplate: ( INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%1), 1, %2) =  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%1), 1, %3) OR  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%4), 1, %5) =  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%4), 2,  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%6))) AND ( INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%4), 1, %5) =  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%4), 1,  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%6)) OR 1 =  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%1), 2, 1))
expressionObjects: variable:Check HCM Recruitment Requisition Data Role.HCM_REC_REQ_DATA_ROLE

dataFilter.expressionTemplate: %1 =  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%2) AND ( INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3), 1, %4) =  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3), 1, %5) OR  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%6), 1, %7) =  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%6), 2,  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%8))) AND ( INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%6), 1, %7) =  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%6), 1,  VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%8)) OR 1 =  INDEXCOL( VALUEOF(NQ_SESSION.%3), 2, 1))
expressionObjects: variable:Check HCM Recruitment Requisition Data Role.HCM_REC_REQ_DATA_ROLE
